Customer.Name: Rajeev Kumar
Customer.Says: I am a contractor, and I have used A.B Int udyog red bricks on many of my projects. I have always been impressed with their quality and consistency. The bricks are always the same size and shape, and they are very easy to work with. I have never had any problems with them breaking or cracking, and they always look great when they are finished. I would highly recommend A.B Int udyog red bricks to any contractor or homeowner.
